title: Welcome to My Blog
excerpt: What this site is, who it’s for, and how I’ll write.
content: This is where I’ll post my articles.
I’ll focus on policy, culture, and current events — with a clear point of view and sources when needed.
If you like it, bookmark the site and subscribe.

title: How I Think About Politics
excerpt: A simple framework: incentives, tradeoffs, and the Constitution.
content: I try to evaluate political issues with a few basics:
Good intentions don’t guarantee good outcomes.
Every policy has a cost — I want honesty about that cost.
Power should have guardrails, and local control often beats centralized control.
